educational_objective: Recognize the classic radiographic findings of rheumatoid arthritis.
question_text: A 42-year-old woman is evaluated for a 6-month history of bilateral hand arthritis.A radiograph of the left hand is shown.
question_stem: Which of the following is the most likely diagnosis?
critique: This patient has rheumatoid arthritis (Option C), as demonstrated by the radiographic findings of symmetric joint-space narrowing, periarticular osteopenia, and erosive changes most prominent in the metacarpophalangeal and proximal interphalangeal joints where the synovium inserts on bone.
